wikipedia_page.main: Hedworth Lambton (26 March 1797 – 16 September 1876) was a Liberal Party politician in the United Kingdom.  He was Member of Parliament (MP) for North Durham from 1832 to 1847.

response: ** Hedworth Lambton, Liberal Party politician in the United Kingdom (d. 1876)
* Hedworth Lambton (MP) (1797–1876), Member of Parliament for North Durham 1832–1847
* Hedworth Meux or Hedworth Lambton (1856–1929), English Admiral of the Fleet during World War I
